description: Manage private endpoint connection of a private link scope resource.

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection approve
commands.summary: Approve a private endpoint connection of a private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection approve [--add]
                                                                  [--description]
                                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                  [--id]
                                                                  [--ids]
                                                                  [--name]
                                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                  [--remove]
                                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                                  [--scope-name]
                                                                  [--set]
                                                                  [--subscription]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection approve --name MyPrivateEndpointConnection --resource-group MyResourceGroup --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection delete
commands.summary: Delete a private endpoint connection of a private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection delete [--id]
                                                                 [--ids]
                                                                 [--name]
                                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                                 [--scope-name]
                                                                 [--subscription]
                                                                 [--yes]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection delete -n MyName -g MyResourceGroup --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection list
commands.summary: List all private endpoint connections on a private link scope.
examples: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection list -g MyResourceGroup --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection reject
commands.summary: Reject a private endpoint connection of a private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection reject [--add]
                                                                 [--description]
                                                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                 [--id]
                                                                 [--ids]
                                                                 [--name]
                                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                 [--remove]
                                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                                 [--scope-name]
                                                                 [--set]
                                                                 [--subscription]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection reject --name MyPrivateEndpointConnection --resource-group MyResourceGroup --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection show
commands.summary: Show a private endpoint connection of a private link scope resource.
examples: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection show -n MyName -g MyResourceGroup --scope-name MyScope

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope private-endpoint-connection wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
